resources.string: The entered word: %1$s is not a valid word.

plurals.name: incorrect_word_length_message
plurals.item: Please enter a 5 letter word.\n%1$s has only %2$s letter.
Please enter a 5 letter word.\n%1$s has only %2$s letters.

resources.string: You found the word right. \nLet\'s solve another one.
You discovered the word right. \nLet\'s solve the next one.
You have got the word. \nLet\'s tackle another one.
You got the word right. \nLet\'s take on another one.
You found the word right. \nLet\'s move on to the next one.
You have got the word. \nLet\'s solve the next one.
You discovered the word right. \nLet\'s solve another one.
You found the word right. \nLet\'s take on another one.
You were unable to resolve the word. The hidden word was: %1$s.\nBetter luck with the next one.
The word was not resolved. The hidden word was: %1$s.\nKeep trying with the next word.
No success in finding the word. The hidden word was: %1$s.\nLet\'s hope for better luck with the next.
The search for the word was unsuccessful. The hidden word was: %1$s.\nKeep going with the next word.
The word stayed unresolved. The hidden word was: %1$s.\nBetter luck with the next one.
You have not won enough games to display the guess distribution. Please come back once you have won at least one game.
The graph below shows the count of words you have solved with the guesses from 1 to 6. For example, if you have solved 7 words in third guess, then the bar drawn from 3 will have value 7.

Wordle is a word puzzle game where you guess a hidden five-letter word in six tries, using deductive reasoning and vocabulary skills. It's a beloved pastime for word enthusiasts, offering a challenging yet satisfying gameplay experience.

\If you are unsure about how to play or the rules of the game, here is a step-by-step tutorial for you.

You can always come to this screen by clicking the help icon in the home screen of the app.
Enter a five-letter word from the dictionary and then click the \'Check\' button.
Image that displays a state in the game.

After clicking the \'Check\' button, you will receive feedback on the word you entered. If it\'s a valid dictionary word, each letter from the word you entered will be highlighted on the grid and also on the keyboard. Refer to the screenshot below for a visual guide.

Green highlights indicate that the letter is in the hidden word and also in the correct position. Orange highlights indicate that the letter is in the hidden word but in the wrong position. Gray highlights mean the hidden word doesn\'t contain that letter.\n\nIn the example below, the letter \uD83C\uDD81 is highlighted green which means that the hidden word will have letter \uD83C\uDD81 in the fourth position while \uD83C\uDD70 is in the hidden word but not in the third position. Similarly, \uD83C\uDD7F is in the hidden word but not at the last position. That is why, letters \uD83C\uDD70 and \uD83C\uDD7F are highlighted orange. And finally, letters \uD83C\uDD82 and \uD83C\uDD77 are not in the hidden word, so highlighted gray.

Based on the feedback from the previous step, our current guess is \uD83C\uDD72\uD83C\uDD7E\uD83C\uDD7F\uD83C\uDD81\uD83C\uDD70. The feedback is displayed in the screenshot below, showing that we successfully identified the position of letter \uD83C\uDD70 in the hidden word.\n\nWe also know that letter \uD83C\uDD7E appears either in the first or third position. Consequently, we can conclude that the hidden word undoubtedly contains the letters \uD83C\uDD7E, \uD83C\uDD7F, \uD83C\uDD81, and \uD83C\uDD70. Furthermore, we\'ve determined that \uD83C\uDD81 and \uD83C\uDD70 occupy the fourth and last positions in the word, bringing us closer to our word guess.

This time, we\'re guessing the word as \uD83C\uDD7E\uD83C\uDD7F\uD83C\uDD74\uD83C\uDD81\uD83C\uDD70. Success! We\'ve made the correct guess, and you can see the confirmation dialog with a delightful animation in the screenshot below.
We hope, this was helpful for you to understand how this game works. Happy guessing!!!
